availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William C. Halbert (Lewis County, farmer and lawyer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and lawyer. Kentucky native. Married to Lavina A. Halbert. Father of Mary Halbert, Walker Halbert, Isaac W. Halbert, Willie C. Halbert, Rachel F. Halbert, Henry D. Halbert, and Anna L. Halbert. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Lawyer in Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 156A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 110.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Vanceburg, p. 12.
Find A Grave, "William Cottingham Halbert (1816-1877)," Memorial #84061619, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84061619# (accessed December 13, 2018).
